TEXT_DICT.This: Contains pairs of Strings, used to get values based on keys.

TEXT: This enemy intends to NL do something involving the number #b
A set of floating islands where primal beasts with elemental associations reside.

TEXT_DICT.enableDMCAMusic: Enable DMCA Music from the original game's OST.
TEXT_DICT.modestyFilter: Enable censored artwork. WARNING: Image edits are low quality.
TEXT_DICT.enableExtraRewards: Enable additional rewards after certain fights. NOTE: the mod is balanced with these in mind.
TEXT_DICT.enableStartOfActEvents: Enables custom events at the start of each act. NOTE: the mod is balanced with these in mind.
